templates.name: Header Template
templates.description: The global site header that appears on every page, containing the main navigation and site identity elements.:contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

features.name: Logo
features.description: A prominently displayed brand logo (usually top-left or centered) that links back to the homepage.:contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

features.name: Promotional Bar
features.description: A top-of-page banner (above or integrated into the header) highlighting key promotions or announcements (e.g. free shipping offers, flash sales):contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}.

features.name: Utility Bar
features.description: A secondary header row for utility links such as account login, store locator, or language selector, to keep the main navigation uncluttered.:contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

features.name: Navigation Menu
features.description: The primary site menu with category links (often with dropdown sub-menus or a mega menu for subcategories) for browsing the catalog.:contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

features.name: Search Box
features.description: A search field for users to search products by keyword, typically with predictive autocomplete suggestions as they type.:contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

features.name: Account/Login Link
features.description: Link or icon for user account access (login/register or profile dashboard) so customers can sign in and manage their accounts.:contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

features.name: Wishlist Link
features.description: Link or icon (often a heart) to access the wishlist or favorites, allowing users to view products they saved for later.:contentReference[oaicite:7]{index=7}

features.name: Cart Icon
features.description: Shopping cart icon displaying current cart item count; clicking it shows a mini-cart preview or navigates to the cart page.:contentReference[oaicite:8]{index=8}

features.name: Currency/Language Selector
features.description: Dropdown for selecting regional settings like local currency or language, for international sites.:contentReference[oaicite:9]{index=9}

features.name: Store Locator Link
features.description: Shortcut to a store finder page, enabling customers to find physical store locations (often found in a top utility bar).:contentReference[oaicite:10]{index=10}

features.name: Contact/Help Link
features.description: Link to customer service or help (e.g. Contact Us or FAQ), ensuring users can quickly get support contact details.:contentReference[oaicite:11]{index=11}

features.name: Live Chat Trigger
features.description: An icon or button to launch a live chat support widget (if enabled), providing real-time assistance to users.:contentReference[oaicite:12]{index=12}

features.name: Cookie Consent Banner
features.description: A banner (often at the bottom of the page on first visit) asking the user to accept cookies or tracking, to comply with privacy regulations.:contentReference[oaicite:13]{index=13}

templates.name: Homepage Template
templates.description: The main landing page of the site, featuring promotional content, featured products, and navigation to key categories.

features.name: Hero Banner/Carousel
features.description: A large feature banner or image slider at the top of the homepage showcasing major promotions or new products.:contentReference[oaicite:14]{index=14}

features.name: Featured Category Links
features.description: Sections highlighting top categories or collections (often with images or icons) that help users shop by category.:contentReference[oaicite:15]{index=15}

features.name: Promotional Campaign Banner
features.description: Clickable promotional graphics or banners on the homepage highlighting sales, campaigns, or important content.:contentReference[oaicite:16]{index=16}

features.name: Featured Products Carousel
features.description: A rotating or sliding showcase of select products (e.g. new arrivals, best sellers), often with an option to add to cart or wishlist directly.:contentReference[oaicite:17]{index=17}

features.name: Product Tile
features.description: Standard product display units showing a product’s image, name, price (and possibly rating), used in grids or carousels.:contentReference[oaicite:18]{index=18}

features.name: Quick View Modal
features.description: A quick-view pop-up that lets users preview product details (image, price, short description, add-to-cart) without leaving the current page.:contentReference[oaicite:19]{index=19}

features.name: Personalized Recommendations
features.description: Dynamic product suggestions (such as ‘Recommended For You’ or ‘Trending Now’) possibly driven by user behavior or AI.:contentReference[oaicite:20]{index=20}

features.name: Content Blocks
features.description: Informational or brand content sections (e.g. about the brand, value propositions, blog snippets, or social media feeds) embedded in the homepage layout.

features.name: Email Signup Callout
features.description: A newsletter subscription form or call-to-action on the homepage encouraging users to subscribe (sometimes in the footer or as a pop-up).:contentReference[oaicite:21]{index=21}

features.name: Testimonials/Social Proof
features.description: Sections featuring customer testimonials, reviews, or social media posts to build trust and engagement on the homepage.

templates.name: Category Page Template
templates.description: The product listing page for a given category (or collection) of products, typically displaying a grid or list of products with refinement options.

features.name: Category Header
features.description: The title or banner of the category, often including a category name, description, or image to inform users about the current category.

features.name: Breadcrumbs
features.description: A horizontal list of links indicating the user’s navigational path (e.g., Home > Category > Subcategory) for easy back-tracking.:contentReference[oaicite:22]{index=22}

features.name: Product Grid/List
features.description: A grid or list display of products in the category, showing each product’s thumbnail image, name, price, and possibly rating or a short description.

features.name: Filter/Faceted Navigation
features.description: Sidebar or horizontal filters that allow narrowing down products by attributes like price, brand, color, size, etc., often with multi-select options.:contentReference[oaicite:23]{index=23}

features.name: Sort Options
features.description: A control (dropdown or buttons) to sort the product results by criteria such as price, popularity, newest, or ratings.:contentReference[oaicite:24]{index=24}

features.name: Pagination or Infinite Scroll
features.description: Navigation to traverse through multiple pages of products (page numbers or 'Load More' button), or an infinite scrolling feature that loads more products as the user scrolls.:contentReference[oaicite:25]{index=25}

features.name: Product Tile Actions
features.description: Quick actions on product tiles such as 'Add to Cart', 'Add to Wishlist', or 'Compare', enabling those interactions directly from the listing.:contentReference[oaicite:26]{index=26}

features.name: Quick View Trigger
features.description: An icon or button on each product tile to open a quick-view modal for that product without leaving the listing page.:contentReference[oaicite:27]{index=27}

features.name: View Toggle (Grid/List)
features.description: An option to switch the layout view between grid and list displays, allowing user preference in browsing (if supported).:contentReference[oaicite:28]{index=28}

features.name: Product Count Display
features.description: A text indication of how many products are being shown and/or total results, to inform the user of the scope of items found.

templates.name: Search Results Template
templates.description: The page displaying results for a user's search query, similar to a category page but generated by keyword search.

features.name: Search Query Display
features.description: A heading or note showing the search term and number of results found, confirming what the user searched for.

features.name: Search Results Grid/List
features.description: A listing of products matching the search query, presented similarly to a category product grid with product tiles.

features.name: Refinement Filters
features.description: Filters to narrow search results by attributes (category, price, etc.), just like on category pages, to help drill down large result sets.:contentReference[oaicite:29]{index=29}

features.name: Sort Results
features.description: Option to sort search results (e.g., by relevance, price, rating), allowing users to reorder the results.

features.name: Search Suggestions
features.description: As-you-type suggestions and auto-complete that appear in the search bar drop-down, including popular search terms or products (predictive search).:contentReference[oaicite:30]{index=30}

features.name: Did You Mean
features.description: Alternate query suggestions shown when the search query might be misspelled or return few results (e.g., 'Did you mean ...').:contentReference[oaicite:31]{index=31}

features.name: No Results Message
features.description: A user-friendly message displayed if no products match the query, often with search tips or recommended products to encourage further browsing.:contentReference[oaicite:32]{index=32}

features.name: Include Content Pages
features.description: If applicable, the search may also return non-product results (like blog articles or help pages) and provide a way to view those.:contentReference[oaicite:33]{index=33}

templates.name: Product Detail Template
templates.description: The page for an individual product, providing comprehensive information and purchase options for that item.

features.name: Product Image Gallery
features.description: A main product image with additional thumbnail images; supports zoom, carousel, and possibly video or 3D media for the product.:contentReference[oaicite:34]{index=34}

features.name: Product Title & Description
features.description: The product name and a detailed description or overview of the product’s features, materials, or usage.

features.name: Pricing Display
features.description: Clear pricing information, including the price (with any sale price or discounts), and if applicable, installment or unit pricing details.:contentReference[oaicite:35]{index=35}

features.name: Stock Availability
features.description: Indication of stock status (e.g., 'In Stock', 'Only 2 left', or 'Out of Stock') and whether backorder or pre-order is available.

features.name: Variations/Options Selection
features.description: Options for selecting product variants such as size, color, or configuration; selecting a variant updates the price or stock if necessary.:contentReference[oaicite:36]{index=36}

features.name: Add to Cart Button
features.description: A prominent button to add the item to the shopping cart (usually disabled or updated if a required variant is not selected or if the item is out of stock).

features.name: Quantity Selector
features.description: Input (usually +/− buttons or a dropdown) for choosing the quantity of the item to add to cart.

features.name: Add to Wishlist/Registry
features.description: Option to save the product to a wishlist or gift registry instead of purchasing immediately (generally for logged-in users).:contentReference[oaicite:37]{index=37}

features.name: Compare Button
features.description: If product compare is supported, a button to add this product to a comparison list so it can be compared side-by-side with others.:contentReference[oaicite:38]{index=38}

features.name: Product Details Section
features.description: Additional information like specifications, size guide (for apparel), ingredients (for consumables), or other details, often organized in tabs or accordions.:contentReference[oaicite:39]{index=39}

features.name: Customer Reviews
features.description: Display of product ratings (e.g., star rating) and customer reviews, plus an option to submit a new review (often via third-party integration).:contentReference[oaicite:40]{index=40}

features.name: Related Products
features.description: A section showing products similar to or commonly bought with the current item (e.g., "You may also like" suggestions).:contentReference[oaicite:41]{index=41}

features.name: Upsell/Cross-sell Products
features.description: Suggested complementary products or accessories often displayed on the product page (for example, matching items or required add-ons).:contentReference[oaicite:42]{index=42}

features.name: Social Sharing Buttons
features.description: Buttons to share the product page on social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter).:contentReference[oaicite:43]{index=43}

features.name: Trust Badges
features.description: Icons or messages conveying security or guarantees (e.g., secure checkout, warranty, money-back guarantee) near the add-to-cart button to reassure customers.

features.name: Shipping/Return Info
features.description: Key shipping, delivery, or return policy information (or links to it), often summarized on the product page to inform purchase decisions.

features.name: In-Store Pickup Availability
features.description: If the retailer has physical stores, an indicator if the product is available for pickup at a nearby store, with a tool to check store availability.:contentReference[oaicite:44]{index=44}

templates.name: Cart Template
templates.description: The shopping cart (basket) page where users review items they intend to purchase, update quantities, and proceed to checkout.

features.name: Cart Item List
features.description: A list of all products added to the cart, each with a thumbnail image, product name, selected options (e.g., size/color), price, quantity, and subtotal.:contentReference[oaicite:45]{index=45}

features.name: Edit Cart Items
features.description: Controls to update item quantities (or remove items) directly in the cart; changes update the cart totals dynamically.:contentReference[oaicite:46]{index=46}

features.name: Order Summary
features.description: A summary of cart totals, including subtotal, any discounts, tax estimates, shipping (if available at this stage), and the grand total.:contentReference[oaicite:47]{index=47}

features.name: Promo Code Entry
features.description: A field to enter a discount or coupon code and apply it to the cart, which then shows the discount amount if valid.:contentReference[oaicite:48]{index=48}

features.name: Shipping Estimate
features.description: An option to estimate shipping costs (often by entering a ZIP code or selecting a country) before checkout, if the platform supports it.

features.name: Continue Shopping Link
features.description: A link or button to return to product browsing (often takes the user back to the last category or homepage) for continued shopping if desired.

features.name: Proceed to Checkout
features.description: A clear call-to-action button that takes the user to the checkout process to complete their purchase.

features.name: Cart Note/Gift Message
features.description: An optional text box for customers to add special instructions or a gift message for the order (available in some implementations).

features.name: Recommended Products in Cart
features.description: Suggested items displayed on the cart page (such as cross-sell or "You might also like" suggestions) to encourage additional purchases.

features.name: Empty Cart Message
features.description: A message or illustration shown when the cart is empty, often with a link to start shopping or recommendations to add products.:contentReference[oaicite:49]{index=49}

templates.name: Checkout Template
templates.description: The multi-step (or single-page) checkout process where the user enters shipping, billing, and payment information to finalize the purchase.

features.name: Guest Checkout Option
features.description: Ability to checkout without creating an account (user can proceed as guest), often alongside an option to log in for returning customers.:contentReference[oaicite:50]{index=50}

features.name: Account Login Prompt
features.description: For returning customers, a prompt or option to log in to their account to pre-fill saved addresses or payment info for faster checkout.:contentReference[oaicite:51]{index=51}

features.name: Shipping Address Form
features.description: Form fields to collect the recipient’s shipping address (name, address, city, country, postal code, phone), often with address auto-complete to reduce errors.

features.name: Shipping Method Selection
features.description: Options for available shipping methods (e.g., Standard, Express) with corresponding costs and estimated delivery times.:contentReference[oaicite:52]{index=52}

features.name: Billing Address Form
features.description: Form to collect billing address (if different from shipping) or a checkbox to copy the shipping address as billing address for convenience.

features.name: Payment Method Entry
features.description: Section to enter payment details – credit/debit card fields (with real-time card type detection):contentReference[oaicite:53]{index=53}, and/or alternative methods like PayPal, Apple Pay, etc.

features.name: Order Review
features.description: A final summary of the order (items, shipping, taxes, total) for the user to review all details before confirming the purchase.

features.name: Place Order Button
features.description: The final confirmation button to submit the order. Often labeled 'Place Order' or 'Complete Purchase', triggering order processing.

features.name: Save Information Options
features.description: Options to save details for future (e.g., save this address or payment method to account) or to create an account from the provided info after placing the order.:contentReference[oaicite:54]{index=54}

features.name: Order Confirmation Page
features.description: After completion, a summary page (and email) confirming the order, with an order number and details, and possibly product recommendations or next steps.

features.name: Multi-Ship Shipping
features.description: If supported, the ability to ship different items in the cart to different addresses within one order (splitting the shipment by item).:contentReference[oaicite:55]{index=55}

features.name: Terms and Conditions Checkbox
features.description: A required checkbox for the customer to agree to terms of service or sales policies before placing the order.

features.name: Promo/Gift Card Redemption
features.description: If not applied earlier, an opportunity to enter gift card codes or promo codes during checkout (some stores handle this in the cart step).

templates.name: My Account Template
templates.description: Pages that allow registered users to view and manage their account details, orders, and other preferences.

features.name: Account Registration
features.description: A user registration page or popup allowing new customers to create an account with email and password.:contentReference[oaicite:56]{index=56}

features.name: Login Page
features.description: A login form for returning customers to access their account (often including a 'Forgot Password' link for recovery).:contentReference[oaicite:57]{index=57}

features.name: Password Reset
features.description: The ability for a user to request a password reset email by providing their registered email address (forgot password functionality).:contentReference[oaicite:58]{index=58}

features.name: Account Dashboard
features.description: An overview page after login that displays a summary of account information, such as the user's name, default address, and recent orders.:contentReference[oaicite:59]{index=59}

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: Forms to edit personal details such as name, email, password (and possibly additional profile info like phone number).:contentReference[oaicite:60]{index=60}

features.name: Address Book
features.description: An address management interface where users can add, edit, or remove saved shipping addresses for use during checkout.:contentReference[oaicite:61]{index=61}

features.name: Saved Payment Methods
features.description: If supported, a section to view or manage saved payment details (credit cards, etc.), allowing adding or removing payment methods.:contentReference[oaicite:62]{index=62}

features.name: Order History
features.description: A list of past orders the user has placed, typically with order numbers, dates, statuses, and totals, and links to view order details.:contentReference[oaicite:63]{index=63}

features.name: Order Details Page
features.description: A detailed view for a specific order from order history, showing the items purchased, shipping and payment info, status, and options like re-order.

features.name: Wishlist Page
features.description: If the platform supports wishlists, a page where the user's saved wishlist items are displayed with options to move them to cart or remove.:contentReference[oaicite:64]{index=64}

features.name: Loyalty/Rewards Info
features.description: If a loyalty program is integrated, display of the user's reward points balance, tier status, or available rewards.:contentReference[oaicite:65]{index=65}

features.name: Newsletter Preferences
features.description: Option for the user to opt in or out of marketing emails or newsletters, and to manage subscription preferences.

templates.name: Wishlist Template
templates.description: A page showing the list of products a user has saved to their wishlist (favorites) for later viewing or purchase.

features.name: Saved Items List
features.description: Displays products that the user added to their wishlist, each with a thumbnail, name, price, and any options (like size) if applicable.:contentReference[oaicite:66]{index=66}

features.name: Add to Cart from Wishlist
features.description: For each wishlist item, an option to add that product directly to the shopping cart (often selecting quantity or options if needed).

features.name: Remove from Wishlist
features.description: Ability to remove items from the wishlist if the user is no longer interested.:contentReference[oaicite:67]{index=67}

features.name: Share Wishlist
features.description: If supported, a feature to share the wishlist (or specific items) with others via email or social media (especially if the wishlist can be made public).:contentReference[oaicite:68]{index=68}

features.name: Privacy Settings
features.description: Option to make the wishlist public or private (visible only to the user or shareable via link), if the platform allows multiple or public wishlists.:contentReference[oaicite:69]{index=69}

templates.name: Comparison Page Template
templates.description: A page that shows selected products side-by-side for feature comparison (if the site allows comparing products).

features.name: Selected Products Table
features.description: A side-by-side display of selected products (often up to four items) in a table, allowing detailed comparison of features and specifications.:contentReference[oaicite:70]{index=70}

features.name: Comparable Attributes
features.description: Listing of key product attributes (like dimensions, features, etc.) as rows in the compare table to easily see differences between products.

features.name: Remove/Add Compare Controls
features.description: Options to remove a product from the comparison, or to add another product (often via search or selecting from recently viewed) to the compare view.

features.name: Direct Actions
features.description: Actions such as 'Add to Cart' or 'Wishlist' for each compared product directly from the comparison page for quick decision-making.

templates.name: Footer Template
templates.description: The global footer section appearing at the bottom of pages, containing site-wide secondary navigation, information, and trust elements.

features.name: Footer Navigation Links
features.description: Sets of links organized by category (e.g. Shop, Customer Service, About Us) providing quick access to information pages and popular sections.:contentReference[oaicite:71]{index=71}

features.name: Site Map/Departments
features.description: An expanded list of site sections or a link to a full site map, helping users (and search engines) see all pages or product categories at a glance.:contentReference[oaicite:72]{index=72}

features.name: Legal Information
features.description: Links to legal pages such as Terms & Conditions, Privacy Policy, Return Policy, and a copyright notice indicating ownership and year.:contentReference[oaicite:73]{index=73}

features.name: Contact Information
features.description: Basic contact details or links (customer service phone number, email address, or contact us page) so users can easily find support.:contentReference[oaicite:74]{index=74}

features.name: Social Media Links
features.description: Icons linking to the brand's social media profiles (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.), allowing users to connect on those platforms.:contentReference[oaicite:75]{index=75}

features.name: Email Newsletter Signup
features.description: A field or form to subscribe to the newsletter, often present in the footer to capture customer emails for marketing.:contentReference[oaicite:76]{index=76}

features.name: Accepted Payment Icons
features.description: Icons or text indicating which payment methods are accepted (e.g. Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, etc.), reinforcing trust and transparency.:contentReference[oaicite:77]{index=77}

features.name: Trust Badges
features.description: Security seals or certifications (like SSL secure and other badges) displayed to reassure users of the site's safety and reliability.:contentReference[oaicite:78]{index=78}

features.name: Store Finder Link
features.description: If applicable, a link in the footer to a store locator page, for users who want to find physical store locations.

features.name: Language/Currency Selector
features.description: Another placement (if not in header) for choosing site language or currency, often provided in the footer for international sites.

templates.name: Store Locator Template
templates.description: A page for finding physical store locations, typically using a map and search functionality.

features.name: Location Search Bar
features.description: An input field for users to enter a location (address, ZIP code, city) to find nearby stores.:contentReference[oaicite:79]{index=79}

features.name: Store List and Map
features.description: A map displaying pins for store locations and a corresponding list of stores matching the search, including store names and addresses.:contentReference[oaicite:80]{index=80}

features.name: Distance Filtering
features.description: Option to filter or limit results by a radius (e.g., within 5 miles, 10 miles) from the entered location.:contentReference[oaicite:81]{index=81}

features.name: Store Details
features.description: Each store entry shows key details such as address, phone number, hours of operation, and services available at that location.:contentReference[oaicite:82]{index=82}

features.name: Directions Link
features.description: For each store, a link or button to get directions (often integrating with Google Maps or similar) to navigate to the store.

templates.name: Contact Us Template
templates.description: A page providing a way for customers to contact the company, typically via a form and other contact details.

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: A form allowing users to send a message or inquiry (commonly fields for name, email, subject, and message) directly from the website.

features.name: Contact Details
features.description: Listed contact information such as customer service email addresses, phone numbers, or physical mailing address for customer support.

features.name: Submit Confirmation
features.description: After submitting the form, a confirmation message or page indicates the inquiry was received and provides any next steps or expected response time.

features.name: FAQ/Help Links
features.description: Often includes links to Frequently Asked Questions or Help Center pages in case users can find answers without contacting support.

templates.name: Gift Registry Template
templates.description: Pages to support gift registries (e.g., wedding or baby registries) where customers can create lists of desired products and share with others.

features.name: Create Registry
features.description: A form to create a new gift registry event with details like event name, date, location, and the registrant’s information (and co-registrant, if any).:contentReference[oaicite:83]{index=83}

features.name: Add to Registry
features.description: On product pages, an option to add items to a gift registry (similar to adding to wishlist), available when a user has created a registry.:contentReference[oaicite:84]{index=84}

features.name: Registry Item List
features.description: A view of all items in a particular gift registry, showing the desired quantity, purchased quantity, and remaining needed, for invitees to see.

features.name: Share Registry
features.description: Functionality to share the registry with others via email or a sharable link, to invite friends and family to purchase items from the list.:contentReference[oaicite:85]{index=85}

features.name: Search Registries
features.description: A search feature for guests to find a registry by name or email of the registrant, if the registry is public.:contentReference[oaicite:86]{index=86}

features.name: Manage Registry
features.description: Tools for the registry owner to manage their registry, such as updating event details, adding or removing items, or deleting the registry.:contentReference[oaicite:87]{index=87}
